The house is partially renovated with the eyes, thoughts, design of an artist and pianist...There is a tank in the garden with an individual 24-hour water line, 24-hour electricity. The house has a spacious yard, an open balcony, a garage, a cellar (refrigerator), a warehouse where you can store fruits for 12 months without damage.There are beautiful sights in the village, Zorats Church, Smbataberd and many other ancient sites.
